title: Hasan Minhaj and Ronny Chieng Announce 2025 North American Tour
description: The comic duo will air their "air their grievances - onstage, at the same time – for a paying audience." Hasan Minhaj and Ronny Chieng Announce 2025 North American Tour Scoop Harrison
author: Scoop Harrison
excerpt: Comedians Hasan Minhaj and Ronny Chieng are hitting the road together for a 2025 North American tour that promises chaos, catharsis, and absolutely no solutions.
text: Comedians Hasan Minhaj and Ronny Chieng are hitting the road together for a no-holds-barred North American tour that promises chaos, catharsis, and absolutely no solutions. Kicking off this October, the 19-date “Hasan Hates Ronny | Ronny Hates Hasan Tour” finds Minhaj and Chieng airing their political grievances live onstage, side by side, in a format that a press release likens to CNN Presidential Townhall but “somehow more demented and with less decorum. This will be a race to the bottom.” No topic is off limits: presidents, war, the economy, immigration, infrastructure, dating, food, family values —even the impending race war. Tickets go on sale beginning Thursday, July 17th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. Hasan Minhaj and Ronny Chieng 2025 Tour Dates: 10/03 — Seattle, WA @ WAMU Theater 10/05 — Houston, TX @ Hobby Center 10/10 — Tampa, FL @ Straz Center 10/11 — Atlanta, GA @ Fox Theatre 10/15 — Philadelphia, PA @ Ensemble Arts Philly 10/18 — Washington, DC @ DAR Constitution Hall 10/24 — Toronto, ON @ Roy Thomson Hall 11/01 — Minneapolis, MN @ Orpheum Theatre 11/07 — Chicago, IL @ Auditorium Theatre 11/14 — Miami, FL @ Adrienne Arsht Center 11/16 — Orlando, FL @ Hard Rock Live 11/21 — Austin, TX @ Bass Concert Hall 11/22 — Dallas, TX @ Music Hall at Fair Park 11/28 — Boston, MA @ MGM Music Hall 12/02 — New York, NY @ Beacon Theatre 12/12 — San Diego, CA @ Jacobs Music Center 12/18 — San Jose, CA @ San Jose Civic 12/19 — San Francisco, CA @ Masonic Auditorium 12/26 — Vancouver, BC @ Queen Elizabeth Theatre
html:
Comedians Hasan Minhaj and Ronny Chieng are hitting the road together for a no-holds-barred North American tour that promises chaos, catharsis, and absolutely no solutions.

Kicking off this October, the 19-date “Hasan Hates Ronny | Ronny Hates Hasan Tour” finds Minhaj and Chieng airing their political grievances live onstage, side by side, in a format that a press release likens to CNN Presidential Townhall but “somehow more demented and with less decorum. This will be a race to the bottom.” No topic is off limits: presidents, war, the economy, immigration, infrastructure, dating, food, family values —even the impending race war.

Tickets go on sale beginning Thursday, July 17th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster.

Hasan Minhaj and Ronny Chieng 2025 Tour Dates:
10/03 — Seattle, WA @ WAMU Theater
10/05 — Houston, TX @ Hobby Center
10/10 — Tampa, FL @ Straz Center
10/11 — Atlanta, GA @ Fox Theatre
10/15 — Philadelphia, PA @ Ensemble Arts Philly
10/18 — Washington, DC @ DAR Constitution Hall
10/24 — Toronto, ON @ Roy Thomson Hall
11/01 — Minneapolis, MN @ Orpheum Theatre
11/07 — Chicago, IL @ Auditorium Theatre
11/14 — Miami, FL @ Adrienne Arsht Center
11/16 — Orlando, FL @ Hard Rock Live
11/21 — Austin, TX @ Bass Concert Hall
11/22 — Dallas, TX @ Music Hall at Fair Park
11/28 — Boston, MA @ MGM Music Hall
12/02 — New York, NY @ Beacon Theatre
12/12 — San Diego, CA @ Jacobs Music Center
12/18 — San Jose, CA @ San Jose Civic
12/19 — San Francisco, CA @ Masonic Auditorium
12/26 — Vancouver, BC @ Queen Elizabeth Theatre
